fields.name: account_type
fields.description: Type of account (e.g., checking, savings)

fields.name: logo_path
fields.description: Path to the bank's logo image

fields.name: customer_iban
fields.description: International Bank Account Number of the customer

fields.name: customer_iban|slice(2,4)
fields.description: Last four digits of the customer's IBAN for privacy

fields.name: customer_iban|slice(8,14)
fields.description: Middle eight digits of the customer's IBAN for privacy

fields.name: customer_account_number
fields.description: Account number of the customer at Citibank

fields.name: account_holder
fields.description: Name of the account holder in this account

fields.name: client_number
fields.description: Client identification number of the account holder

fields.name: date_of_birth
fields.description: Date of birth of the account holder

fields.name: statement_period
fields.description: Period covered by the bank statement

fields.name: statement_date
fields.description: Date the bank statement was issued

fields.name: opening_balance
fields.description: Balance of the account at the start of the statement period

fields.name: transaction.date
fields.description: Date each transaction occurred on the account

fields.name: transaction.description
fields.description: Description of each transaction on the account

fields.name: transaction.debit
fields.description: Amount debited from the account for each transaction

fields.name: transaction.credit
fields.description: Amount credited to the account for each transaction

fields.name: transaction.balance
fields.description: Balance of the account after each transaction

fields.name: total_debit
fields.description: Total amount debited from the account during the statement period

fields.name: total_credit
fields.description: Total amount credited to the account during the statement period

fields.name: total
fields.description: Final balance of the account at the end of the statement period
